message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this is a competitive price for its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is closer to its true value. Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet you at $17,500. I would like to propose $16,000 as a compromise.
